attributes.action: Legislate every property within the UK to have an efficiency rating
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UK properties are needlessly expensive to heat & light, Sweden adopted 5-layer glass decades ago, consequently all UK properties failing to meet the Swedish standard to be deemed unfit for human habitation [i.e., F on a scale of A through F].  Walls of 5-layer floor-to-ceiling glass combined with heat-exchange & air-conditioning will greatly enhance the experience of working & education at home [i.e., teleworking].

Tied to global-warming, commuting is prohibitively expensive & overcrowded on a hopeless transport-infrastructure. Mandating desk-jockeys telework 4 or more days per-week will address the need for congestion-charging & reduce pollution.
